message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate the deal, but $14,000 is still a bit higher than my target price. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. What do you think?
I understand that $13,000 is a bit lower than what I was initially hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $13,500. What do you think?
